prompt.text: It was nice working with you all. :-)
Are you all with me? Your input is welcome anytime :-)
It would be great have all of you participating in the discussion more.
Hey, team... do you have any input?
Do any of you want to add something ... ?
Okay, we've kind of stalled. Can someone summarize the discussion so far?
Sorry... Must be my mistake
Oh.. I wasn't paying attention! Sorry...
Hmmm.. My bad, sorry guys
Did I miss something? Sorry...
I'd love to hear more from [STUDENT]...
Any input from [STUDENT]?
[STUDENT] might have something to add to the discussion...
I wonder what [STUDENT] has to say.
I would appreciate everyone's participation in this discussion
It would be good to have everyone in on this discussion :-)
Y'all have a lot to gain by working together...
Thanks for contributing to this discussion, everyone!
I appreciate your participation in this discussion
It's good to have your contributions to the discussion :-)
Thanks for taking the time to discuss this concept guys!
Y'all are awesome.
:-) don't be rude to each other!
You won't get this done unless you can work together well.
We are all teammates, let's work together.
You can figure this out as a team!
You're all in this together... help each other!
One of the great things about teamwork is helping each other.
*smiles*
I'm glad to be working with this team.
We're a good team :-)
Go team!
Okay
Ok
Go on...
Good
Sounds good
m-hmm
I see
Ok
... ok
... okay
gotcha.
m-hmm
Alright
Got it
Watch your language!
Let's get serious about the assignment.
Stop fooling around! We only have limited time for this.
Keep up the good work!
I hope we're doing all right...
Let's keep going.
Everything ok?
Things seem to be going well...
